summary: Adds Map Markers to various unmarked locations, such as dragon burial mounds, ritual sites and other things not covered by my other mods ;-)
descriptionHtml:
Adds Map Markers to various unmarked locations, such as dragon burial mounds, ritual sites and other things not covered by my other mods ;-)

I was inspired by the mod \"The Cartographers Map Markers\" by Feyawen, but decided to try myself.

Does not require nor cover Dawnguard or Hearthfire.

[COMPATIBILITY & CONFLICTS]

Should be compatible to anything, if you use any mod that also adds map markers (like the one mentioned above), you will simply have 2 markers at that place ;-)

 [CHANGE LOG]

2.2:
 - Minor Changes

2.1:
- Added Dragon Burial Mounds
- Minor Changes

2.0
- Initial release

[LINKS]

Steam:
Map Markers Complete: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=103043341
Map Markers Complete - Open Cities: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=103154849
Other mods of my \"Map Marker\" series: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=101756110

Nexus:
Included in [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25603]Map Markers Complete[/url]
Other mods of my \"Map Marker\" series:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25294]Map Markers Camps and Shacks[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25455]Map Markers Cities[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26246]Map Markers Landmarks[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26245]Map Markers Ruins[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25217]Map Markers Shrines and Temples[/url]

[NOTES]

Be aware that this Map Markers must still be discovered like any other in vanilla game. If you visit a location before installing this mod the marker will not be there. To test if it is installed you may travel to a location that is marked (look at the screenshots). Or you may use the console command \"tmm 1 1 0\" to turn all map markers (also vanilla) on (be sure to safe your game before this since this action cannot be undone!).

[FOR MODDERS]

Feel free to use my mod in any way you want, including chaning, rewriting or using parts of it. If uploading anything that uses parts of my work, please tell me via PM and give credit. Thanks :-)
author: SarthesArai
